Body.Content:
We are announcing the public preview of the Entra Privilege Identity Management (PIM) within the Power Platform admin center, which was made available on February 5, 2024. PIM is a service in Microsoft Entra ID that enables you to manage, control, and monitor access to important resources in your organization. This includes resources in Microsoft Entra ID, Azure, and other Microsoft Online Services such as Microsoft 365 or Microsoft Intune.

What do I need to do to prepare?
If you want to participate in the public preview of PIM, please sign up here.

Title: Power Platform - Entra Privilege Identity Management (PIM) available in public preview
